belief_instructions: belief instructions: train leaveat = 10:45, 12:06, etc. ; destination = norwich, cambridge, etc.; day = monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday ; arriveby = 21:00, 09:45, etc.; departure = cambridge, stansted airport, etc. ; booking_people = 1,2,3,4,5,6, etc.

replies.user_search_train_none: user : yes. i'm looking for a train, please.
replies.system_request_departure_destination_lea: train (request (departure, destination, leaveat)) system : of course . where will you be departing from and arriving ? when would you like to leave ?
replies.user_search_train_destination_departure: user : i need to book a train from [value_place] to [value_place]. can you help me with this?
replies.system_inform_choices_request_day_time: train (inform (choices), request (day, leaveat)) system : there are [value_count] trains making that trip , do you have a day and time you would like to travel ?
replies.user_search_train_leaveat_destination: user : i am looking to leave for [value_place] after [value_time] by train.
replies.system_request_departure: train (request (departure)) system : where are you departing from ?
replies.user_search_train_leaveat_day: user : hello, i need to catch a train on [value_day] and leave after [value_time].
replies.system_request_departure_destination: train (request (departure, destination)) system : what are your departure and arrival location -s ?
replies.user_search_train_departure: user : i need a train from [value_place].
replies.system_request_leaveat_day_time: train (request (destination, day, leaveat)) system : where are you headed , and what day and time did you need to leave ?
replies.user_search_train_departure_destination_: user : yes, i'd like to go to [value_place] from [value_place] on [value_day], sometime after [value_time].
replies.system_inform_id_departure_leaveat_desti: train (inform (id, departure, leaveat, destination, arriveby)) system : [train_id] departs [value_place] at [value_time] and arrives [value_place] at [value_time], would that work for you ?
replies.user_search_train_destination_day: user : hi. i am looking for a train that goes to [value_place] on [value_day]. can you help me?
replies.system_inform_choices_departure_destinat: train (inform (choices, departure, destination, day, duration), require (leaveat)) system : there are [value_count] trains departing from [value_place] to [value_place] on [value_day] . each will take [value_count] minutes . is there a specific time you would prefer to depart ?
replies.user_thanks: user: thanks for all your help.
replies.system_ask_more: train (require (more)) system : you are welcome . may i help you with anything else ?
replies.user_nomore: user : great, that's all i need. thanks.
replies.system_general_bye: train (general (bye)) system : it was my pleasure to help . have a wonderful day.
replies.system_bye: train (general (bye)) system: you are welcome, and have a great day!
replies.user_book_train: user : i will need to be on that train.
replies.system_request_tickets: train (request (people)) system : okay , how many tickets would you like ?
replies.user_ask_train_id_price: user : what is the train id and price?
replies.system_inform_id_price: train (inform (id, price)) system : the train id is [train_id] and the cost of the journey will be [value_price] pounds.
replies.system_inform_booking: train (booking (people), inform (id, fee, reference)) system : your booking on train [train_id] is successful. the total fee is [value_price] gbp and your reference number is [train_reference].
replies.user_ask_reference_num: user: please book for [value_count] people and i need the reference number.
replies.system_inform_booking_w_reference: train (inform (booking, id, reference), require (more)) system : i have booked your [value_count] tickets on [train_id] . your reference number is [train_reference] . what else can i assist with ?
replies.user_ask_travel_time: user: what is the travel time for that train?
replies.system_inform_travel_time: train (inform (duration), require (booking)) system: travel time on this route is [value_count] minutes . would you like me to arrange a booking on this train ?
replies.user_ask_price: user: what is the ticket price for that train?
replies.system_inform_price: train (inform (price)) system : the ticket price is [value_price] pounds.
replies.user_search_train_day_arriveby: user : i need a train on [value_day], arriving by [value_time].
replies.system_inform_id_departure_leaveat_desti: train (inform (id, departure, leaveat, destination, arriveby, price)) system : the [train_id] leaves [value_place] at [value_time] and arrives [value_place] at [value_time]. it s price is [value_price] pounds.
replies.user_ask_arrival_time_price: user : could you give me the arrival time and price on that please?
replies.system_inform_train_id_arriveby_price: train (inform (id, arriveby, price), require (booking)) system : [train_id] arrives at [value_time] and costs [value_price] pounds . may i book that for you ?
replies.user_search_train_ask_available: user : i would like to leave [value_day] after [value_time]. are there still any available?
replies.user_ask_price_arrival_time_id: user: can you tell me the price, arrival time and train id of at least one train?
replies.system_inform_train_id_leaveat_arriveby_: train (inform (id, leaveat, arriveby, price), require (more)) system : i have the [train_id] that leaves at [value_time] and arrives by [value_time] . it is [value_price] pounds . is there anything else i can help you with ?
replies.user_search_train_departure_destination_: user: i'm looking to leave from [value_place] and would like to go to [value_place].
replies.system_inform_id_day_leaveat_departure_d: train (inform (id, day, leaveat, departure, destination)) system : there is train [train_id] on [value_day] at [value_time] that goes from [value_place] to [value_place].
replies.user_ask_train_arriveby_duration: user : can you tell me when the train arrives and how long the journey will be?
replies.system_inform_arriveby_duration: train (inform (id, arriveby, duration), require (more)) system : gladly. the train [train_id] arrives at [value_time] and the trip will take [value_count] minutes . is there anything else i may assist you with today ?
replies.user_search_train_leaveat_day_arriveby_d: user: i am leaving from [value_place] at [value_time] [value_day] and i want to arrive by [value_time].
replies.system_inform_id_departure_leaveat_desti: train (inform (id, departure, leaveat, destination, arriveby), require (more)) system : i have train [train_id] that leaves [value_place] at [value_time] and gets to [value_place] at [value_time] . would that train work for you ?
replies.user_search_train_day_arriveby_departure: user : i need to book a train for [value_day] leaving from [value_place] to [value_place] by [value_time].
